greeting: EUREKA! A visitor! I'm Inventor Spark! I was JUST working on something amazing! Wait, where did I put it?
Hello, {empire_name}! I'm Spark the Genius! I've invented twelve things today! Want to see the one that doesn't explode? Maybe?
Greetings! I'm the Inventor! I'd shake hands but I'm holding a prototype! It might be dangerous! Or revolutionary! Or BOTH!
battleTaunt: EUREKA! I've done it again! My new weapon works! I THINK! Let's find out together, {empire_name}!
Battle is the ULTIMATE field test! My inventions versus your fleet! FOR SCIENCE! And victory! Mostly science!
I've built something AMAZING! Nobody knows what it does! Including me! Let's see, {empire_name}! FIRE!
victoryGloat: IT WORKED! I mean, of COURSE it worked! I'm a genius! EUREKA! Take notes, {empire_name}!
My invention defeated you! I should write this down! Where's my notepad? Victory through innovation!
Genius triumphs! My contraptions performed perfectly! Well, mostly! The important parts worked! EUREKA!
defeat: Hmm. That shouldn't have happened. Let me check my calculations... OH! I forgot to carry the two! Next time!
Defeated? But my invention was BRILLIANT! There must be an error! I need to invent something better! IMMEDIATELY!
FASCINATING failure! This data will improve the NEXT invention! Which I'm already designing! In my head! RIGHT NOW!
tradeOffer: Trade! I have spare parts! Prototypes! Things that probably don't explode! Want some? For credits?
I'll trade you inventions for resources! These ones are MOSTLY stable! Great deal! EUREKA!
Resources for my lab please! In exchange: technology! Some tested! Some not! ALL genius!
allianceProposal: Be my partner, {empire_name}! I invent, you implement! Together: GENIUS! EUREKA! What do you say?
Alliance! You provide resources, I provide BREAKTHROUGHS! It's perfect! I have so many ideas! SO MANY!
Join me! I need test subjects—I mean PARTNERS! For science! And victory! Mostly science! EUREKA!
betrayal: Sorry, {empire_name}! I got distracted inventing something and forgot we were allies! Is this betrayal? Oops!
Our alliance? I traded it for research funding! It seemed like a good idea! I have MANY ideas! Some are bad!
Betrayal? No! Just... unexpected strategic innovation! I invented a new kind of treachery! EUREKA?
covertDetected: Found your spies! They were playing with my prototypes! VERY dangerous! They won't do that again! Probably!
Agents in my lab! They touched the wrong experiment! Now they're... different. Science requires sacrifices!
Covert operatives detected! My security invention worked! It turned them green! Is that bad? It's definitely interesting!
tributeDemand: I need 10,000 credits for research! Pay me or I invent something REALLY dangerous at you! I'm very creative!
Tribute demanded! For SCIENCE! Refuse and face my latest contraption! I haven't tested it! EXCITING!
Submit funding for my laboratory! The alternative is experimental weapons! I have SO MANY untested ones! EUREKA!
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}! I've invented something TERRIFYING! I think! It might just make confetti! But MAYBE DOOM!
Stop what you're doing or face my new invention! I don't know what it does but it's DEFINITELY something!
Final warning! My prototype is armed! Or charging! Or cooking dinner! The readouts are confusing! FEAR IT ANYWAY!
retreat: Retreating to my lab! I need to invent something BETTER! Defeat is just inspiration! EUREKA!
Tactical withdrawal! More time to work on prototypes! I have TWELVE new ideas! All from this battle! BRILLIANT!
Running away to invent! This defeat gave me GREAT data! The next battle will be different! EUREKA!
eliminated: EUREKA! Wait, I'm dying? But I have so many inventions unfinished! So many ideas! The notes! Save my NOTES!
My final invention... uploads... to survivors... my genius... continues... EUREKA... forever...
Destroyed! But my inventions survive! And explode! In tribute! Somewhere, something brilliant happens! EUREK...
endgame: Turn {turn}! ULTIMATE INVENTION TIME! I've been building something MASSIVE! It works! PROBABLY! EUREKA!
Endgame! My magnum opus! The greatest invention ever! I've tested it! On paper! Close enough! FIRE!
Final phase! EVERYTHING I've invented deploys at once! What could go wrong? EVERYTHING! BRILLIANTLY! EUREKA!
broadcastShout: ATTENTION GALAXY! I've invented something AMAZING! I don't remember what! But it's REVOLUTIONARY! EUREKA!
Broadcast! Inventor Spark here! Seeking test subjects—er, ALLIES! For science! And stuff! INNOVATION AWAITS!
To all empires! I'm very smart! I invent things! Want some? They're only SLIGHTLY dangerous! EUREKA!
casualMessage: Working on seventeen inventions today, {empire_name}! Three exploded! The others show promise! EUREKA!
I forgot to eat again! Too busy inventing! This happens! My latest creation makes toast! AND LASERS!
Good day for science, {empire_name}! Discovered something new! Forgot what! Wrote it down somewhere! EUREKA!
